text: 1918 New York Giants The 1918 New York Giants season was the franchise's 36th season. The team finished in second place in the National League with a 71-53 record, 10½ games behind the Chicago Cubs. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
